description.name: Featurebase Livechat
description.tagline: Easily integrate Featurebase Live Chat into your WHMCS installation with this lightweight and user-friendly addon.
description.long: The Featurebase Live Chat Addon seamlessly integrates with WHMCS, providing a secure and intelligent live chat experience for your customers. It allows for customer support, user tracking, and optional identity verification, with real-time data synchronization between WHMCS and Featurebase.
features: Easily add the Featurebase Live Chat widget to the WHMCS client area.
Loads asynchronously to avoid slowing down your pages.
Automatically identifies logged-in customers in Featurebase.
Optional Identity Verification to prevent third parties from impersonating users.
Supports Featurebase user hash for secure identification.
Identity is always executed to keep user data up-to-date.
Syncs WHMCS customer data with Featurebase when the user is logged in and DataSync is enabled.
If DataSync is disabled or the user is no longer logged into WHMCS, the Featurebase session is automatically cleared (Identity) to prevent stale sessions.
Configure identity verification, identity secret, and data synchronization directly in WHMCS/Featurebase.
